K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-4: mang du za zhing bdud khyim 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-5: bltas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-6: klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-7: 'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-8: ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-9: gang gis rlung phyogs song ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-10: khro bo thams cad nges par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-11: na mo bya ci ri bhyo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-12: ha ha ru lu ru lu bhyo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-13: mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-14: lag pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-15: lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-16: rta mgrin gnas kyang nges par 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-17: mgo drug po la rkang drug bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-18: lag pa drug ni rgyud drug gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-19: rkang pa gsum ni phur bu 'dril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-20: g-yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-21: gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-22: rkang pa lcags phur rab tu drag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-23: 'od zer dud kas reg pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-24: tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-25: lag pa g-yon pas bskyod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-27: lcags kyus dgra sta rab thogs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-29: byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-30: lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-31: lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-32: spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-33: bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-34: skad ni 'brug pas shin tu che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-35: rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni; ;phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-36: mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-37: lus kyang nag la 'od phung nag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-38: yan lag nag la sbrul gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:243b-39: ral pa nag cing mche ba nag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-1: nag po; ;mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-2: 'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-3: las rnams thams cad grub par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-4: long ba rgyab sbrel phyi ma nang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-5: mam sa za zhing ri lu sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-6: mig kyang med la cang mi smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-7: yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-8: 'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-9: las rnams thams cad grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-10: shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-13: dung gi ba lang sna khrid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-14: dung gi mi mo chen mo zhon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-15: lag na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-16: lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-17: lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-18: lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-19: lcags kyi mi mo chen mo zhon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-20: lag na zhags pa sgril ma thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-21: nub kyi phyogs na 'gugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-22: zangs kyi khyi mo chen mo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-23: zangs kyi ma mo chen mo zhon; ;lag na lcags sgrog sgril mthogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-24: byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-25: gser gyi khyi mo chen mo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-26: gser gyi mi mo chen mo zhon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-27: lag na rdo rje phur bu 'dril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-28: 'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-29: las rnams thams cad grub par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka pho nya sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-32: dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-33: dbus su bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244a-34: sku mdog mthing nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa zhig dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-0: @244b shar du rdo rje til mar dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-1: lho ru stag gi mgo can dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-2: nub tu g-yag gi mgo can dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-3: byang du sbrul gyi mgo can dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-4: de'i phyi rim padma la brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa gsum la pho nya sum brgya bcu dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-5: de'i phyi rim snam bu la yang sbrul gyi pho nya dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-6: de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-7: pho nya las byed bzhi dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-13: 'di rnams yang dag pa'i bden du nges par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsang ba he ru ka'i rol pa las rdo rje pho nya'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs shing phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-16: bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-17: thugs rje sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-18: yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-19: 'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhen chags khro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-20: gnyis med dag las 'phrin las snying rje snyoms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-21: dpal chen khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-22: rtog 'joms spyod pa mthun pas 'gro 'dul zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-23: brda can yan lag len pa'i don go la; ;lha rgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-24: bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod par 'os //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:244b-26: lung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-1: gi spyi gcod man ngag gdeng du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-2: spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog phub la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-3: bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis mgos sa bcad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-4: khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-5: 'di ni khrag 'thung rngam brjid rgyal po'i lung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-6: zhes tshig nyung zhing mdor 'dus la don mang por 'byung bas mdo sde zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-7: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-8: lung gsum gyis sna drangs te rde'u bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-9: man ngag gsum gyis mjug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-10: spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi gcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-11: spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog dbub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-12: bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba bcom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-13: rtsis mgo drug gis sa bcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-14: khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-17: yon tan kun rngam pas brjid gzhan la snang phyir rngom brjid chen po sum cu rtsa drug bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-18: rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni; rin po che sna bdun gyis rgyal por gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-19: lung gis spyi dril de bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-20: de ltar rnam pa bcur nges nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-21: da ni phye byang ngo bstan te gses nas bshad pa de la lung gsum ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-22: zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-23: lhag mthong ma rmongs gza' skar mkha' la bkram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245a-24: gdod bcas don dang bstun de 'tsham par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-0: ting 'dzin shes rab bka' @245b lung gsum du nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-1: de la man ngag gsum ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-2: bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod nas thong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-3: yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzad du gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-4: yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyings su gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-5: nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spong man ngag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-6: de la spyi don gsum ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-7: med rgyu btag chags sgrub 'grub bltas par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-8: spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa'i dbal sos 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-9: rtog 'joms sman rdzas dngos len dngos grub rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-10: 'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-11: de la spyi khog bcu bzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-12: gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-13: gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-14: ngag khro shugs khro bar bcas dang bcas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-15: rtogs pa thugs rje rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-16: gang la snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-17: las dang 'bras bu sems can sgrub pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-18: las bzhi sgrol mdzad 'bras bu sku gsung thugs; ;ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-19: dus gsum mi yong sha rus khrag la rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-20: gang gi ro ni h'um dang ha he phat//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-21: gnas na lta 'og mkha' stong ye shes thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-22: bskyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum po khro bo'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-23: 'bras bu dpal chen phra men tshogs kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-24: phra men las drag 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-25: de la bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-26: tsham ngam drag pos lha chen 'dar 'gyel brdzis; ;brtul zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po bshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-27: dug gsum brlag phyir sha rus khrag la za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:245b-28: rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i gnas su stobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-0: rtsis mgo drug ni dbang dang rab tu @246a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-2: dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-3: ye shes dang ni nan tan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-4: drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-6: chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-7: mnyes stobs yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-8: dran med thod pa kham por g-yang gzhi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-9: kha dang rgyal mtshan che dang lha chen gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-11: byams las khyab pa thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-12: thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-13: smon lam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-14: gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-15: yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-16: khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal te rnam drug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-17: de la dpal yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-18: bsam gyi mi khyab pa bzhi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-20: sku gsum sa gsum sems dpa' rtogs dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-21: bka' khyab sprin bdal char 'bab chu bo'i rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-22: ting 'dzin bsam yas bo dhis thogs pa de; ;bsam yas bsam khyab mkhas la gza' skar gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-23: klu mthu gdul phyir klu lngas sku brgyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-24: mang chen gsung sgra dbyangs dang pho nya'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-25: dug lngas gdos bcas 'du byed brgyan byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-26: khrag sprul g-yang gzhi khra ta dregs pa 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-27: de la gzugs rnam pa gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-28: mi thud bus pa'i gzugs 'dra la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246a-29: aa go la ni rkang lag gtams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-0: drang srong @246b khros pa'i cha byad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-1: shin tu mkhrang zhing skem lpags bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-2: gnod sbyin snying bags mi mthun gzugs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-3: 'dul dbang yi dvags srin po drang srong 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-5: buddhi bo dhis bstod dam sras spun dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-6: gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-8: rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-9: 'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen 'khor ba'i mtha' las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-10: gnyis su med par mkhyen pas dbu ma'i ngang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-11: mdor na thams cad pa yi ye shes yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-13: nan tan snying po zag med zag bcas 'du; ;nan tan 'phrin las 'gro ba gnas nas 'don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-14: bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chud mi gson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-15: nan tan mchog gi mchog tu shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-16: da ni lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te bshad do; ;de yang mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-17: che mchog yon tan gyi lung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-18: yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-19: de la mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-20: glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-21: bdud 'joms sman rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-22: stag ni dpa' rtun za byed rgyan zhes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-23: ye shes thugs rje'i 'phrin las ngang du bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-24: sbrul ni gnyen lcug 'phrin las rgyan zhes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-25: 'jigs tshul dug gnon 'khrul pa yum gyi rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-26: thod phreng dbang sgrol 'chad pa'i rgyan zhes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:246b-27: sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang 'chang sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-1: gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-2: byang chub sems tshul dam khrims gos zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-3: rakta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-4: mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje spyan; ;gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-5: bcud kyi thig le don dam kun tu 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-6: thal ba 'dul byed 'phrin las rgyan zhes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-7: yi ge 'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-8: me ni 'bar 'phro 'du sreg klong dkyil zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-9: ye shes thugs rje dbyings 'dul 'phrin las te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-10: zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-11: me sgra sgra chen tha dang sgra zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-12: chos sku khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-13: ral pa kham nag snyil zhing phye ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-14: de nas chos nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-15: sku mdog mthing nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-16: 'dul dbang mtha' med yon tan dgongs pa gting mi dpog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-18: de la khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-19: gong du bshad par zad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-20: de la dpal he ru'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang ma nges bar 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-23: de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-24: de la dngos byung phyag rgya rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-25: nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad; ;mkhas pas bsgoms la ci dgar 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247a-27: 'o na yang 'di'i gnas skabs su he ru ka dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-0: de yang yan lag @247b rtags kyi lung gis bshad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-1: grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-2: mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-3: de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-4: dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsung thugs lhun grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-5: lta spyod rnam gsum grub pa'i rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-6: spyan dgu sa gsum sku gsum ye shes gsum ste dgu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-7: bgrod med thob med dmigs pa las 'das pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-8: rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' yangs dbu ma'i spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-9: shangs gsum srog la mnga' mdzad ting 'dzin gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-10: de bzhin nyid du kun tu snang zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-11: sgra chen tha dad sgra chen chos sku ting 'dzin snyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-12: zhal gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-13: ljags gsum theg gsum mthar phyin shes bya'i rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-14: mche bzhi 'phrin las mthar phyin zhi ba'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-15: ye shes drug ni mthar phyin phyag drug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-16: pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-17: zhabs bzhi lam bzhir bgrod pa med pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-18: de la mdzad pa rtags zhes bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-19: spyan dgu sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-20: spyan gsum srid gsum mgo rgyud so sor mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-21: shangs gsum nas byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-22: snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-23: dbug sum srid gsum mgon mdzad sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-24: zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum zad bar rdub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:247b-25: ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs ngar sgrogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-2: mche bzhi skye shi rtsa nas gcod par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-3: phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-4: phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-5: zhabs bzhir 'phrin las rnam bzhi bgrod med sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-6: yan lag rtags kyi lung gis 'di ltar yang dag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-7: rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-8: rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'bigs shing 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-9: chos sku rdo rje tog dang bag chags bsregs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-10: ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-11: bhandha bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-12: chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-13: ye shes dbyings rtogs zhen khrag thugs rje skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-14: mtha' gnyis skyon la mi bsngags bzod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-15: kha tv'am stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-16: dug gsum dga' byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-17: stong gsum srid pa yo 'dul rgyal po'i rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-18: kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-19: zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-20: 'bod pa'i g-yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-21: sbyin pa'i za bas mkha' 'gro tshim par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-22: rdeg pa'i dbyig pas gdon bcas phung po bshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-23: rtog pa chos nyid dran med shes lnga gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-24: ji ltar smon cing grub pas de skad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-25: thong gshol thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248a-26: nyon mongs thab thugs rjes zlog mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-0: ye shes chos @248b dbyings mtha' dang bral ba'i rtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-1: thabs kyis sku gsum lhun grub sprul pa 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-2: brda ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-3: yul med ma skyes chos sku rnga sgo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-4: 'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyu gus brdungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-5: gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-6: 'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyi mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-7: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-8: padma 'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-9: tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-10: mi bzad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-11: ral gri ye shes thugs rje mtha' gnyis gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-12: rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis las brtson 'grus mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-13: dgra sta zhags pa la sogs phyag mtshan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-14: rang gnyer las kyi brda tsam chos sku rtogs par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-15: de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gis spyir dril te bshad pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-16: yon tan gyi brjid la 'phrin las kyi rngom sum cu rtsa drug bstan pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-17: de la sku'i rngom pa bzhi la nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgyar rngom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-18: cir yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs tshul rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-19: zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-20: tsham dam chen po'i stobs rngom pa dang bzhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-21: de yang kun rdzob rang bzhin med pa la nam mkha' la sprin dra ba'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-22: lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:248b-23: smon lam cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-1: gnon pa dri med padma nyi zla 'od yon tan rtags de gdan khri'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-5: gsung gi rngom bzhi la hom lnga 'brel bar 'byung ba'i zhal rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-6: zla gam cir yang 'gyur pa'i ljags rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-7: skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-8: gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rngom pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-9: de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ro rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pa 'brel pa rnam lnga'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-11: rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-12: mche ba bzhi ye shes bzhi'i 'phro 'dus dug bzhi ye shes bzhis gcod pa'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-13: 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam par bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-14: thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-15: 'phrin las rgya mtsho rgyan gyi dpa' rlabs ltar rngom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-16: yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-17: mdzad pa rol me rgyan gyi gar thabs ltar rngom pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-18: de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-19: rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249a-20: lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma g-yos par snang ba'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-0: @249b zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin la zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung ba'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-1: zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-2: zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol ba las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' ba skyed pa'i tshul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-3: mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la ru tra bcos pa'i gnas rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-4: lha chen gnon pa'i gdan rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-5: khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-6: rtog 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-7: de yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-8: gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-9: zhing khyad par can khams gsum yo sgrol ba'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-10: spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog pa dus gcig tu bcom pa'i tshul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-11: rngom tshul sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-12: de la brjid chen po la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-13: sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-14: grangs mang rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-15: bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-16: khyad zhugs yid dang 'thad pas brjid che ba ste bzhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-17: de yang chos sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sku che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-18: thugs rje dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul rags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-19: sems 'du byed dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul pa grangs mang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:249b-20: smon lam gyi sgo nas rigs dang mthun pa'i rkyen du 'tsham //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-0: @250a *// spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-1: rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-2: rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-3: 'phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-5: gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-6: tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-7: bdag la cher ston snyam pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-8: khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-9: de yang chos skus khyab pa'i sgo nas sgra che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-10: sgra tha dad pa'i sgo nas stong gsum gang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-11: sgra dbyangs sgo nas kun gyis go bas myur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-12: nye bar bsgyur ba'i sgo nas the tshom gcod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-13: byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-14: thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tsher ston /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-15: shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-16: tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas 'dul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-18: yangs pa re dogs med pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-19: gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-20: thugs rje thugs dam mthar 'byin pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-21: ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-22: de yang gnyis med pa'i sgo nas yangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-23: spang blang med pa'i sgo nas re dogs med; lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mang gsal /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-24: zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi 'gyur bas gnyis mtha' spangs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250a-25: mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-0: 'khor @250b ba ji srid bzhugs pa'i sgo nas thugs dam mthar 'byin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-1: shes rab kyi sgo nas rmongs pa sel /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-2: ting 'dzin gyi sgo nas thabs kyis 'dul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-3: yon tan gyi brjid bzhi la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-4: med pa zad mi shes pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-5: gcig la 'dod dgur ston pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-6: gnod sbyor phan par 'dod pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-7: thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos pas brjid che'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-8: de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgo nas med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-9: med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-10: ye shes kyi sgo nas gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-11: sems kyi sgo nas 'dod rgur ston /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-12: sems kyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-13: grub pa rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-14: shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-15: spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis ma gos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-17: mi mnyel nyams phag rol pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-18: 'khor ba yun ring mi mnyel bas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-19: mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas brjid che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-20: dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-21: de yang sgyu mar gyur ba'i sgo nas mi mnyel /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-22: rang bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-23: spyod pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun ring por bzhugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-24: bya ba med pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-25: mthu'i sgo nas mgon skyabs che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-26: dam bcas pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rgyun tu mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-27: rtse gcig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-28: nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:250b-30: sgo bzhi bcu ste spyir drug cu pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:251a-1: la rin po che sna bdun ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:251a-2: 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcus skye ba bzhi la dbang bskur re //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:251a-3: bcun mo rin po ches ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:251a-4: yul gyi rgyal po la mnyes par dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:251a-5: dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:251a-6: khyim bdag rin po ches tshad med pa bzhi'i rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin to //
