K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:258b-25: rtsi mchog ye shes badzra aa mri ta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:258b-26: ye shes 'phro byed yon tan rgya mtsho sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:258b-27: thugs rjes 'phrog byed 'jig rten dbang du bdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:258b-28: ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbang du 'ub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-0: @259a *// de phyir brlag byed badzra ma ra na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-1: de ni padma dbang chen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-2: dbang phyug ma'i lha rgyud brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-3: bco lnga spyan gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge bcu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-4: ye shes lnga dang so so cis 'dul mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-5: snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal gsan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-6: shangs lnga nas byung rigs lnga'i sprul 'phros pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-7: rgyud lnga'i mgon mdzad brtson ldan rta dbu lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-8: dug lnga zhal du shar te rdub mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-9: ljags lnga the tshom gcod phyir theg lnga 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-10: skye bzhi las bzhis sgrol mdzad gshog bzhis bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-11: bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gis 'dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-12: phyogs brgyad 'dul phyir zhabs brgyad khro brgyad bcom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-13: rigs bzhi snod bcud nyi zla 'od dang brdzis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-14: phyogs bzhi rtsal drug dbang phyug yang ches mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-15: che ba che yang che bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-16: bcu drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-17: tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas bcu drug sa la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-18: phyogs bzhi dbu lngar 'bar ltar rigs lnga'i dbu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-19: mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rjes gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-20: tshogs chen yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-21: dbang chen yongs su 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-22: tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs ye shes lhun grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259a-23: dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brjid pa'i khro bo rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-0: thugs rje 'dam skyes spyod pa @259b skyon mi gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-1: mtha' gnyis dbang mdzad padma he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-2: rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin mo'i gzugs 'dzin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-3: thod rus gdug pa 'bum mar zas su za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-4: srid pa'i sems can chags pa'i snying khrag gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-5: dbang drag las mdzad ma bu raksha si //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-6: sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das rtog tshangs pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-7: tshad med bzhi rdzogs rtags kyi dbu bzhir ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-8: zhabs bzhir smra 'don gling bzhir bkra shis brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-9: gti mug yid bzhin rin chen pra ma ti //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-10: thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs rigs mchog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-11: ma rig dug gsum 'joms mdzad dpal rtse bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-12: bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad dka' zlog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-13: chags pa'i skyon bral te chen re'u tri ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-14: thams cad sgyu ma bzhin tu rtogs mkhyen ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-15: 'brel ba'i thugs rjes sems can kun la gtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-16: 'phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzheng chen can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-17: 'khor ba'i rgyud gcod drag mo po sna ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-18: 'du byed mi rtag dril bu'i sgra ltar mkhyen; ;rtag par gzhon tshul 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-19: nyon mongs tha ba 'bigs pa'i mdung thung 'phen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-20: gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad go 'u ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-21: rdo rje las mdzad kun gyi bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-22: lha yi rgyal srid chos la dbang bsgyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-23: mtshon sbyin brgya mdzad mi dmigs sku dkar mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:259b-24: gsod byed rdo rje 'bebs byed aindra ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-1: dang thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-2: bandha snod yangs bcud kyi khrag mtsho la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-3: rngam pa'i zhal du dug gsum za byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-4: sdug bsngal dbyings su skyong mdzad ba ki lam//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-5: sems can gdul thabs khro bo mchog tu mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-6: mun sel sgrol bar bdud kyi nad gsos mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-7: 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-8: chags pa'i skyon bral dbang mdzad aa mri ta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-9: zhi ba'i las ni gsod pa'i mchog tu mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-10: zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar phyin sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-11: gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-12: gtan mchog thams cad stob byed se'u mya la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-13: dbyug pa 'tshog pa 'dra ba gzhan med mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-14: thabs kyis ma rmongs 'phrin las ljang gu'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-15: nan dbang drag shul 'tshog pa'i dbyug to bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-16: dregs byed spyi nas 'joms mdzad dan ha ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-17: log par lta ba 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-18: skye ba 'phrog byed skye rgyun khrag mtsho gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-19: las mdzad chags pa gser gyi rked chings can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-20: drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyur raksha si //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-21: phreng ba rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu mdzad; ;snying rje rgyun skad ba su zhags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-22: chags med zhing du khams gsum kun 'dren ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260a-23: rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol mdzad baksha si //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-0: 'tshog pa dbyug @260b pas 'chang ba'i mchog tu mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-1: gtun bus gdug pa ma lus 'joms mdzad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-2: yon tan mi zang nor gyi gter 'dzin ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-3: stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ral gri ma; ;ra ro 'dra bar dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-4: chos rnams gnyis med don rtogs rtag tu myos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-5: nyon mongs tha ba zlog pa'i gshol bsnams shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-6: dge ba'i lo tog skyed mdzad ru ti ram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-7: brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham dpa' bo mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-8: ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-9: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig pu spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-10: gsod byed 'dra mdzad ae ka ra tsa ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-11: bud med chags pas 'gro ba dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-12: thams cad ma lus mgu byed dge ba'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-13: 'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid gsum ying 'phrog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-14: thugs rjes zhen pa'i ma no ha ra ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-15: khrag las zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-16: gdon rnams bsgyur ba'i las mdzad sgo gtong can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-17: mi zad nor gyi gter ldan bum pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-18: sdug bsngal re skong thag thug si ti ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-19: reg bya'i sems ni rlung gi khams te mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-20: srid gsum dbugs kyi srog sbyin tshe 'phel ma; ;bder gshegs ras rgyus sems can sgrol mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-21: khams gsum gnas nas skyon mdzad pa ya be //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:260b-22: snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i tha ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-1: 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-2: gsang ba nyid la las kyis 'dul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-3: sdug bsngal dbyings su gsol mdzad mar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-4: gzi brjid can de me yi khams te mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-5: 'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsregs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-6: za byed bskal pa dus mtha' tshul ston pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-7: lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro aagan ye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-8: mche ba dag pas skye bzhi rtsad gcod bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-9: nyan thos tha ba zlog mdzad phag gi dbu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-10: 'og gi phyogs nas srid gsum stobs kyis spor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-11: skye bzhi rtsad gcod za byed pa ra ti //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-12: 'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'phos mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-13: thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'chi bdag mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-14: dam tshig srung ba'i 'chi bdag zlog mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-15: lung gi dur khrod dbang mdzad dza mun te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-16: 'jigs las lhag pa'i grags ni gzhan med mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-17: stong phrag brgyad cu grags la mnga' mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-18: sna chen glang sna bdud rtsi gi wang mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-19: sdug bsngal nad gsos mdzad pa'i pu tam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-20: chu las lhag pa'i nor ni gzhan med mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-21: nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-22: gdug pa 'dul phyir dug gtong sprul zhags bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-23: zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang sdud ba ru na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261a-24: 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog nag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-0: srid gsum 'joms mdzad @261b tri sh'u la gdengs po bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-1: thugs rje shugs kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-2: 'khor bar thugs rjes shar ba'i ka ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-3: chags pa'i thugs rjes don mdzad ra mgo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-4: byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-5: gang la cis 'dul de la des ston pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-6: yon tan tshogs rdzogs re skong tsa ka lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-7: ston pa'i bka' dang rang gi dam bcas gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-8: mi 'da' ma grub rab tu brtan par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-9: dam tshig sgrog gis sems can 'dul mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-10: ma rig nub mdzad kunda ka rnam 'phrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-11: sku gsum yon tan 'phrin las mtha' klas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-12: stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud la 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-13: so so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-14: ma chags byang mdzad lam po dha ra ma; ;dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-15: bzlas pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las thabs dang shes rab kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang 'di bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-17: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad padma'i lte ba la rakta'i mandal byas te dbus su badzra he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-18: shar du buddha he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-20: nub tu padma he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:261b-21: byang du ka rma he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-0: mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma @262a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-1: bzhi; de'i phyi rim snam bu la go rim brgyad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-2: de'i phyi rim la sidha ma brgyad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-3: sgo bzhi dang sgo khyud dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims te yum kun tu bzang mos rang gi mtha' la byang chub kyi sems blangs te nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-10: byang chub sems nyid bsgom pa'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-12: sems nyid rtogs pa'i thig btab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-13: de ru slob ma bskur bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-14: chos rnams thams cad brtag par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-15: brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-16: da ltar sa gsum gnon pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-17: sems can nang na mi yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-18: sangs rgyas mis ni sgrub thag nye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-19: byang chub sems de'i don rtogs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-21: de las kyang ni ma gtogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-22: de las sangs rgyas gzhan na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-23: sems nyid dngos po de las med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-24: bstan cing yang ni rtogs par dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-25: bsgom pa'i dngos gzhi'ang de las med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-26: sems kyis brtag par dka' na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262a-27: tshig gis 'di yin bstan dka' zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-0: @262b sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-1: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-3: phyi yi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-4: sems la srid pa thams cad chub bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-5: nang gi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-6: sems la sku gsung thugs kyang phrugs par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-7: gsang ba'i tshul du snang ba thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-8: yum chen kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-9: sems ni snang ba shar ba'i ye shes yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-10: gnyis su med par rtogs na chos kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-11: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-13: mngon ba'i sangs rgyas che ba yum chen kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-14: bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-15: yab yum gnyis su med par gyur pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-16: byang chub sems nyid bde ba chen po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-17: chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas bde ba chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-18: yum dang sems nyid gnyis su med pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-19: rdo rje sems ni ye nas mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-20: skye 'gag med pa'i sems nyid don yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-21: sems dpa' yi ni bdud bzhi med pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-22: kun tu khyab cing bdal ba dpag tu med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-23: thams cad man ngag la ni thams cad rten /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-24: gdod nas 'tshangs ni rgya ba'i che bar gsungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-25: phyi ni snod kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na; ;'byung ba lnga las sangs rgyas gzhan na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-26: nang ni bcud kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:262b-27: sems las ma rtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-2: bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-3: rang byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha' las 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-4: sems la dngos po med cing gzung du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-5: gnas ni yum gyi bha ga ya ti ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-6: rnam par mi rtog chos nyid stong par gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-7: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-8: rig pa rnyed pa dag la shin tu gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-9: byang chub sems kyi dngos gzhi ma gtogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-10: sangs rgyas gzhan na med ces 'byung ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-11: mi rtog pa'i lta ba mi bslad pa'i ye shes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-12: mi gtong ba'i spyod pa mi 'gyur ba'i sems nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-13: mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig mi 'bral ba'i gzungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-14: mi g-yo ba yi chos nyid dbyings dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-15: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-16: mnyam par shes pa sangs rgyas kun gyi rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-17: mtho ris srin mon rag dmyal ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-18: mnyam pa'i don dang rig pa gnyis med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-19: 'di dang phyi ma'i don du bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-20: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-21: mdzod gsum ston pas sangs rgyas kun gyi rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-22: phyi ma'i don du srid pa'i gnas 'gro bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-23: nang gi tshul du gnas ni rtogs 'gyur na; ;sku gsum lus ngag yid gsum gnas gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-24: de yang gsang ba'i gnas su rtogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263a-25: kun gzhi yid dang rnam shes yid dang gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-0: gsang ba'i @263b mdzod gsum yin pas bskur par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-1: de la sems kyi gzugs ni ci 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-2: tsitta'i dbyings nas 'od ni tshon gang 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-3: dkar ser snum la 'dril ba gcig tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-4: las 'phro len las gzhan ni len pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-5: sems ni rta dgug nyid rgyu ba yis 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-6: mi chags mi 'khor ba yi don de ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-7: 'od dang bcas pa tshon gang gsal bar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-8: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-9: rtag pa chen po rnam snang mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-10: mi bskyod pa ni sems kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-11: bdag gi lus ni rtag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-12: bdag gi gsung ni 'gyur ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-13: bdag gi sems ni mi bskyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-14: sems nyid dus gsum 'gyur ba med par gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-15: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-16: thig lo chen po dgu yi lung bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-17: man ngag gnyer chen rnam shes tshogs dgu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-18: yid kyi rnam shes las 'phro len pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-19: rnam par shes pa'i byang chub sems nyid 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-20: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-21: med pa'i phyal ba dang ni gcig pu lhun gyis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan bskal par mi nyams rdul tsam med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-23: rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rang dbang las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-24: gzhan na sangs rgyas btsal gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:263b-25: btsal kyang rgyal ba mi rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-1: med byang chub sems dpa' las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-2: ma gtogs gzhan na med ces bya bar gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-3: byang chub sems nyid mnyam par khyab gdal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-4: bdag dang gzhan du med par rtogs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-5: de ltar sus rtogs skyes bu gcig pu yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-6: lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes kyang de la bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-7: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-8: dran pa'i sems can sems kyi rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-9: dkar 'tsher snum la 'dril bas byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-10: mdzangs pa zin po sems shes de la bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-11: blun po byol song sems ni na bun dud pas 'dres //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-12: sems gnas phung po tsitta'i dbyings dkyil na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-13: 'od kyi thig le dkar 'chang gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-14: nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems de ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-15: ti dang ra dang nas btags zhabs 'khyud rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-16: gu gu zla tshes dag tu gnas gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-17: mi las sangs rgyas dag tu gnas bsgyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-18: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi sa bon 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-19: bdag gi ma yengs brjod bral med par 'di bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-20: sangs rgyas 'bras bu yang dag byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-21: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-22: nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-23: mgon chun de las gzhan med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264a-24: rnal 'byor dam nyams gzhan gyis mi skong gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-0: bdag gi sems nyid kun @264b tu bzang po'i dang gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-1: bya tsa dang ni bral zhing 'das pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-2: 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-3: nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dbyar med mnyam pa chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-4: de la sangs rgyas gang nas btsal kyang rgyal bas mnyes par ma gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-5: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-6: glang po dpal gyi thugs ka nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-7: lcags kyi zer chen bzhi 'phros te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-8: glang po dpal chen he ru ka'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-9: lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-10: 'od zer dgu 'phros gdug bam lus bcom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-11: 'gro ba mtha' dag rnams kyi don byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-12: bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-13: kun gzhi snying la 'dus pa'i he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-14: de ltar lags pas brtags nas byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-15: gang nas btsal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-16: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-17: bdag med khams kyi snod gang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-18: rgya che gsal ba'i khams bkang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-19: re dogs med par phung 'gro yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-20: nyam nga med pa lam gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-21: gza' gtad med pas don du bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-22: de bas rang sems bgrod pa'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-23: byang chub sems ni yangs shing rgya che ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-24: de bas bdag gis lus rtogs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-25: snod bcud la sogs rtogs pa'i skyes mchog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:264b-26: shes gsal blo ldan rnams la ye nas rnyed pa gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-0: bla ma'i rgyud mchog de la @265a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-3: bsgoms pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ma bsgoms stong bral med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-4: thugs nas zhal du byung ba 'gro ba'i don du gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-5: rna rgyud ston pas thugs brtol te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-6: lus dang sems las ma gtogs bsgom du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-7: bsgoms nas sems nyid gzhan nas btsal yang rnyed par ma gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-8: dus gsum rgyal bas ye nas ma bces te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-9: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-10: chos nyid bsgom par bya ba gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-11: man ngag shes rab sbyin chen des gsungs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-12: lus dang sems las ma gtogs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-13: bdag gi sku gsung thugs la tshang bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-14: [?] la te brjod pa'i mtha' bzhi yod na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-15: don rdzogs sgom pa po yang yod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-16: lus sems skye ba med bden bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-17: bsgom du med par 'jog pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-18: don kun rdzogs [?] byang chub par der gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-19: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-20: zla gsang dkar dmar rlung ka lci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-21: zla ba shes rab gsal ba thabs chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-22: thig le byang chub sems nyid dkar la 'tsher ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-23: dmar ba yum gyi rakta byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-24: rlung la shor du mi rtsal thig le sgom dus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-25: de las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265a-26: man ngag tshul du zla ba'i gzugs yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-0: gsang @265b ba'i tshul du yid kyi rnam shes nyid kyang zla ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-1: thig le sems kyi rang bzhin snum la 'dril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-2: man ngag len par byed pas sems kyi thig le yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-3: sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-4: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-5: rang byung che ba'i ye shes mi 'gyur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-6: chos nyid rang gis gnas pa'i rang bzhin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-7: dmigs bral ting 'dzin rgya mtshor rab sprul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-8: yid ni 'phags pa'i lam ni gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-9: phra zhing zab pa bstan dka' rgyal ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-10: dran par byed pa'i rtsol dang srog chags [?] gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-11: kun gzhi padma'i yig 'bru gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-12: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-13: rgyu ni skye ba med pas rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-14: 'bras bu 'gags pa med pas byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-15: byang chub sems de skye med ye shes dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-16: skye med mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-17: sems la rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-18: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-19: 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das; ;nam mkha' rdo rje snang ba ston pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-20: sa rdo rje chos nyid ye nas gnas pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-21: me rdo rje chos nyid rin po che'i sangs rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-22: chu rdo rje snying rje chen pos brlan pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-23: rlung rdo rje 'dod pa sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-24: 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:265b-25: dngos grub stsol ba rnam gnyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-0: nges pa'i lung dang rang bzhin @266a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-1: no; ;chos kyi dbyings las mnga' brnyes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-2: gang ltar bsgrubs kyang dbyings kyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-3: chos kyi dbyings la 'char ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-4: dbang chen dbang bsgyur 'chi ba med; ;sprul pa kun tu bzang po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-6: byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-7: lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-8: de yang sa gser zla ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-9: gser dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-10: byang chub sems ni sa zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-11: zla ba me dang 'dra ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-12: byang chub sems nyid kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-13: gsal zhing dro la nyon mongs sreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-14: byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-15: don ni dbyings dang ye shes yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-16: yab yum gnyis med rol pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-17: rakta byang chub sems dkyil na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-18: ma skyes rdzogs pa'i he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-19: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-20: yon tan 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-21: gsang ba'i don gyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-22: gsang ba yum chen kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-23: rakta byang chub sems dkyil na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-25: sems kyi thig les thig btab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-27: chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-28: don gyi dbyings nas lha dang lha mo dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-29: nges pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-30: nga dang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-31: lhun gyis rdzogs dang spros ba med pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266a-32: thugs kyi dkyil nas 'byung ba rigs kyi sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-0: kun tu @266b bzang po yum dang don gyi thabs chen las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-1: man ngag dang bcas pa yi ye shes snying po'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-2: bcom ldan gsang ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-3: dbal chen kun tu bzang po ye shes te gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-5: mah'a su kha'i dbyings nyid na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-6: byang chub sems nyid de kho na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-7: ye shes chen po lhun gyis rdzogs nas gnas mah'a su kha gsang ba chen po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-8: don dang ldan te kun tu bzang po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-9: ngang las ma g-yos kun tu bzang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-10: gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-11: gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-12: yum gyi nags tshal chen po 'dul med du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-13: rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-14: nga ni dus gsum bzhugs shing rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-15: bdag nyid 'dus ma byas pas skye ba med par lhun gyis grub [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-16: gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-17: srid pa byang chub sems su ma bcos thig ler zlum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-18: sngar 'das dang ldan bzhugs dang phyis 'byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-19: sems nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-20: nyon mongs dri ma ya nas med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-21: ye nas sangs rgyas ma skyes lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-22: byang chub sems nyid gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-23: dpal chen kun tu bzang po dbye ba med pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-24: sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las sprul pa mang po 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:266b-25: lhag pa'i ye shes bye brag gcig 'du 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-1: ba med pa rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-2: sku ni thams cad chos kyi sku ru 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-3: lam ni thams cad rol pas chub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-4: yum gyi dbyings chen rang bzhin rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-5: zas ni thams cad bdud rtsi lnga yi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-6: spyod pa bya ba med pa chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-7: thugs ni rtog pa mi mnga' sa le ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-8: ldem dgongs don dam byang chub sems kyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-9: byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-10: rnar brgyud ston pas thugs brtol te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-11: nges pa'i lung dang don yang sangs rgyas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-12: sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro ba zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-13: byang chub sems ni kun tu rtag pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-14: rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-15: dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-16: sku rgyan 'khor lo lung chen zab mo nang nas gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-17: lnga bzhin nang du 'phor ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-18: ye shes sangs rgyas de las med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-19: lta ba 'di la gnas shing rnal 'byor skal ba bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-20: bder gshegs kun gyi thugs dam byang chub sems kyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-21: don dam dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-22: dbyings nas gsal shar bdal ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-24: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yid la thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-25: 'greng ldog spyi'u tshugs gar 'gyur yang; ;gang ltar byas pa byang chub sems kyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-26: thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-27: mun nag langs kyang khams gsum gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267a-28: ye shes khrus kyi rdzing bu ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-0: dri la dag pas rdul @267b mi 'go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-1: dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid las gzhan pa'i 'khor rigs bzhis 'khor ba'i phra men ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-3: khro bo rdo rje bka'i pho nya nams la bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-5: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-6: sangs rgyas rnams su grub bya'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-7: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis longs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-8: shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-9: rnam grol dag pas gsung skad sgrogs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-10: dril bu 'di ni sgra snyan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-11: phyogs bcu kun tu sgrogs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-12: dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-13: de nas dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-14: rakta'i mgo ma yin gyis byugs la; ;de ru dpal chen dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-15: phra men 'khor dang pho nyas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-16: de ru slob ma gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-17: de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-18: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-19: bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-20: rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-21: dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-22: dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-24: nang dang gsang ba gsum gyis bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-25: phyi'i dbang rin po che sna bdun la sogs te dbang rdzas lnga bcu rtsa lngas dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-26: nang dbang dpal chen po yab yub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-28: phra men rnams kyi phyag mtshan gyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-29: gsang dbang thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:267b-30: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang bzab mo las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-0: @268a *// dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-2: chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sku gsung thugs mnga' ba'i rtags su dang po phyag rgya chen po drug dang ldan par bsgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-3: de nas kun mkhyen ye shes kyis thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes go shag gis phye la kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin du bsgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-4: de nas rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin du yi ge h'um mthing nag las sku smug nag 'jigs pa'i sku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-5: gsung gi drag shul spyod pa'i sngags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-6: thugs ting nge 'dzin h'um mthing nag las 'phags pa'i skur bsgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-7: de nas he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-8: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-9: gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-11: mnyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-12: grub pa rdzas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-13: rdo rje tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-14: rdo rje bza' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-15: bdud rtsi btung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-16: lha'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-17: phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-18: rdzogs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-19: rdo rje gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268a-20: dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-0: bla na med pa'i ting nge @268b 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-1: rdo rje gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-2: dgyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-3: don yod ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-4: nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-5: kun tu 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang; rtog pa 'joms pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-6: tshul khrims chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-7: dbu ma chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-8: bden pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-9: sgra sgrogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang; dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-10: lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-11: kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-12: 'bar ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-13: gtum po rngam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-14: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-15: rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-16: rdo rje 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-17: rdo rje las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-18: khrag 'thung chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-19: rdo rje lbos pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-20: seng gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-21: bzhad gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-22: rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-23: rdo rje'i dur khrod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-24: dregs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-25: rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-27: rdo rje gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-30: rngam par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-31: glo snying nang khrol 'dren cing zas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:268b-34: byin gyis rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-1: yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-2: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol ba'i rgyud gsang ba zab mo las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o;; ;;de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i mnyes pa chen po'i mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-4: de la mchod pa dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-5: thog mar rtog bsgoms bdag nyid bsgral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-6: de nas gnyis med blo yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-7: blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-8: gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-10: bdag nyid mnyes pas mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-11: mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-12: bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-13: bzang dang btung dang bca' dang bgo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-14: longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-15: dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-16: mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos rab tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-17: sha chen dang ni dri chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-18: ga bur rakta'i dri chu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-19: ma he rta dang khyi sha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-20: na ge ge rgya ga shog pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-22: padma can dang dung can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-23: ba lang can dang ro mo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-24: 'di dag mnyes pa'i mchod par dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-25: zhing gi rgyal mtshan sha chen tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-26: ras chen dag gi bla re dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-27: zhing gi dbyug pa tsitta'i tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-28: til mar dag tu bcas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-29: 'di dag mchod par dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269a-30: mnyes pa'i mchod pas rab mchod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-0: thams cad ma lus @269b mngon sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-3: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-4: mchod pa gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rel pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lus phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-6: bla med mi spang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-8: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-9: yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-10: gsung ba'i don du mi smra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-18: phrag dog dag mi spang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-19: dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri chen sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-20: dag pa'i snod bcud mi 'dor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-21: yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-22: ye nas ma nyams rtogs pas spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-23: bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-24: rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-25: mi spong mi 'dor gnyis po ni; ;yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-26: mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-27: mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-28: mnyam rdzogs chen po thob gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-29: 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-30: rtsa nyams pa yi phyal ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-31: gsol nye bar mi brtson dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-32: skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-33: nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-34: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-35: sgrub pa thams cad nyams bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-36: yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-38: yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:269b-40: dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-1: rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-2: rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-3: gcig la gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-4: yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-5: gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su med; ;bsrung bar bya ba dang mi spang ba brgya nyi shu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-6: dang du blang ba brgya nyi shu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-7: spyad par bya ba brgya nyi shu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-9: dam tshig 'di rnams mnyam na sangs rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-10: nyams na dmyal ba yin par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-11: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-12: dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-14: blang bar bya ba'i snod ni gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-15: spang bar bya ba ci lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-16: mtshan nyid rnam pa du zhig mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-17: spyad par bya ba du zhig mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka rol pa'i don bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-19: dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-20: gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-21: drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-22: dum bu brgyad pa rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-23: bram ze rgyal rig rje'u rigs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-24: dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma nges //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-25: dkar dang dmar dang dkar sngo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-26: sngo dang de bzhin ser skya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-27: thal ba'i mdog dang mdog mi sdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-28: kha dog bdun du rab tu grags nyi rim dang ni glang po'i rgyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-29: 'khor ba de bzhin bya rog rjes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-30: dung sngo gcig dang dung gnyis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-31: chag pa dang ni mtshams gyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270a-32: 'di dag thams cad rab brtags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-0: rab tu brtags te @270b spyad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-1: shin tu mnyam pa'i sa phyogs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-2: snyi pa'i ma yang na dul ba'i sar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-3: sngags kyis btab ste gnam du bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-4: ltung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di rig bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-5: lho phyogs kha bltas bram ze med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-6: srin po'i phyogs bltas glang po snyol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-7: nub kyi phyogs bltas rigs ngan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-8: rlung gi phyogs bltas gsang mi thub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-9: byang gi phyogs bltas phyug por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-10: dbang ldan phyogs bltas sngags grub ster; ;shar du bltas na bdag nyid gsod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-11: me yi phyogs bltas she'u shing med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-12: 'og tu bltas na rkun por spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-13: steng du bltas na bud med gsod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-14: gler bltas de ni rigs ngan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-15: snod kyi mtshan nyid 'di rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-16: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-17: dge ba sprul pa'i snod dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-18: dum bu gcig pas la dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-19: gnyis pa de ni rgyal phran 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-20: gsum pa de yang nor la dbang bzhi pa de yang sngags sgrub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-21: lnga pa de yang chos kyang sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-22: drug pa de ni slong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-23: bdun pa de ni brtul zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-24: brgyad pa yongs su spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-25: dum bu gcig pa bram ze'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-26: gnyis pa de ni rgyal po'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-27: gsum pa rje'u rigs yin pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-28: bzhi pa de ni dmangs rigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-29: bu gu med dang mang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-30: mkhas pas shin tu spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-31: bong chung ba dang srab pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-32: gang dag ser bar gyur pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-33: bud med yin par shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-34: bud med rab tu smad pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-35: de dag rab tu spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-36: ser skya dang ni dkar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:270b-37: kha dog sna tshogs spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-2: lha mo sprul bas mi blang nge //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-3: dung sngo ba dag sdug bsngal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-5: nyi rim gyis ni gsod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-6: glang po rgyab ni nad du 'gyur; ;'di las gzhan yang bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-7: gsang ba sgrub thod mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-8: yan lag che phra mang ba'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-9: dpag bsam shing ni yod gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-10: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur te; ;sngags pa de la the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-11: dbus na gshod bu bzhi yod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-13: mdun na gshong bu gnyis yod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-14: yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-15: de yi mtshan nyid ldan pa'i snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-16: su dag rtag tu 'chang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-17: longs spyod thar pa thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-18: de la lha mo the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-19: de nas rigs ni rnam bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-20: snod rnams kyi ni bye brag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-21: dung dang kun zla 'dra ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-22: snum la mnyam du sdug pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-23: sdugs rnams thams cad 'grub ster yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-24: dbang phyug chen por shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-25: thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-27: tshangs pa'i skud pa gsol ba yod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-28: 'di dang tshangs par rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-29: sbrang rtsi sar skya'i mdog 'dra ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-30: zhi ba'i thig les rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-31: khyab 'jug pa yi snod yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-32: zug rdu dgra rnams 'joms par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-33: kha dog dmar zhing lnga pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-34: padmo dmar bas brgyan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-35: zlum pa shin tu rnam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271a-36: snod 'di gzhon nu ma zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-0: cung @271b zad ser zhing zlum la zab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-1: gang dag rdo rje mchen yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-2: de yi mtshan ldan gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-3: dbang phyug chen mo rigs chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-4: phag mo'i gdong dbyibs 'dra ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-5: rab tu mkhregs shing mu tig 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-6: sha yi dri dag mnam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-7: snod ni phag gdong ma zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-8: thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-9: thig le chen pos rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-10: khrag 'dzag pa yi dri mnam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-11: 'jigs byed ma yi snod ces bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-12: snod kyi khyad par shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-14: bdag bka' byed na bzhin bzang ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-15: de la bgegs kyis tshugs mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-16: de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-17: snod kyi dngos po khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-18: tshangs pa bram ze bcang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-19: rtag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-20: sgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-22: rtag tu las rnams 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-23: rgyal rigs kyis ni gzhon nu ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-24: pha rol yul ni rnam par 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-25: rje'u rigs kyi ni dam chen mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-26: blo dang ldan pas bslog phyir bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-27: gsad dang bsgral dang bstabs pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-28: dmangs rigs kyis ni phag gdong bcang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-29: las dang rigs rnams thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-30: 'jigs byed mas ni dngos grub ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-31: re ba med pas bdag nyid mas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-32: grub pa'i khyad par 'di shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-33: 'du ba med pas bdag bsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-34: rtag tu 'di dag spyad cing bcang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-35: bdag gi dngos grub skye ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-36: sngags pas de nas bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:271b-38: ba du ba ya smra sha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-1: si ni ai tang ka pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-7: chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad snod la btab ste blang bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-8: ri mo rdo rje 'khor lo dang; ;mchod rten dang ni rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-9: padma dang ni ljon shing dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-10: dbus na bu ga gnyis yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-11: mdun na gshong bu gsum dang gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-12: gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-13: dpal dang ldan pa'i snod gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-14: srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-15: srubs gsum ba dang srubs bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-16: lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-17: dgu dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-19: bcu drug pa dang nyi shu drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-20: 'di dag rab tu spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-21: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-22: kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol ba snod brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-23: de nas dbang phyug chen po bsgral ba'i thabs 'di bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-24: mah'a ru tra'i rgyud dur khrod mah'a ru tra brgyud pa'i dbang du bsdu ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-25: phyi rol phyogs gar bde ba'i sar zhing chen stan gar 'os ba zhig tu mandal byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272a-26: gnas chen dur khrod kyi bdag po chen po'i cha lugs dri ltar nyal tshigs bcad las byang ba bzhin tshon gyis bris /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-1: de'i dbus su hom khung gru gsum ba zhig bkod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-2: rdo rje slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bca' ste mnyam pa nyid du sgom pa'i sngags la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-3: aa sa mah'a ca la dharma dha tu sva bh'a ba a'atma konyh'um zhes cung zad bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-4: mi g-yo phyag rgya chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-5: chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-6: gnyis med phyag rgya rol pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-7: dus la bab pos ma ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-8: zhes brjod nas rnal 'byor gzhan gyis 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mkhas pa zhig gis las 'di bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-10: rgyud kyi gtsug lag chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-11: bden pa'i tshig gis bsgrags nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-12: 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-13: 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-14: thugs rje dang dang shes rab dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-15: thabs la mkhas pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-16: 'gro ba thams cad sbyong bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-17: 'gro ba'i bdag po tshe dang srog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-18: gson po bde ba'i bar gcod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-19: bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-20: bcom zhing gsod pa'i gnyen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-22: srid gsum mthar byed rngam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-23: thod dbyug drag po mi mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-24: gshin rje bcom ste bsad nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-25: ro yang lho yi 'dzam gling du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-26: bor nas sa gzhi dur khrod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-27: bdag po gdol ba drag po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-28: ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-29: mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-30: rkang ba byang shar mtshams su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:272b-31: de yang cung zad bsnol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-2: khyi gnyis dang ni bya rgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-3: thal ba'i mdog la sku sgreng ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-4: de yi lus snying yan lag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-5: ma mo chen mo rnams kyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-6: dur khrod chen po 'di dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-7: de yi snying ni ma he'i lto //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-8: dur khrod chen po bsil tshal na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-9: ma mo chen mo goo ri ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-10: mkhas pa snying stongs che ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-11: de yi mgo ni lho phyogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-12: sing+ga la yi gling phran na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-13: ma mo chen mo tsoo ri ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-14: mthong thos rngam ba'i rdzu 'phrul mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-15: lag pa g-yas ni shar lho mtshams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-16: bal yul na ni bukka si //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-17: 'khor dang longs spyod sna tshogs ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-18: lhag par zas kyi 'byor pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-19: lag pa g-yon ni lho nub mtshams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-20: sa yi tshal na be t'a li //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-21: phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-22: de nas mthu dang dbang yang che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-23: rkang pa g-yas pa byang shar mtshams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-24: li yul na ni tsanda li //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-25: shang+ga na zhes grags pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-26: de yang 'khor dang longs spyod ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-27: rkang pa g-yon pa nub byang mtshams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-28: skad ni skad sna mthun pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-29: ma mo chen mo pra mo ha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-30: bde skyid ldan pa'i sa la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-31: pho mtshan steng gi byang phyogs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-32: au rgyan yul na ghasma ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-33: sbyor bas longs spyod 'jug pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-34: dngos grub can yang de na mang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-35: de nas sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir; ;bris te bsams nas dgongs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-36: dur khrod bdag pos 'dus pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-37: dbang du bsdus pa'i las brtsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273a-38: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-0: de @273b nas 'geng la rdo rje khu tshur sku g-yas su bzhag cing mig gis phyogs bcur bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-2: skye shi gnas ni dur khrod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-3: rang bzhin yid ni rnam gzigs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-4: sa gzhi dur khrod gnas su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-5: bdag gis yid ches par bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-6: sta na'i dkyil 'khor bsams la gar bris pa'i sar bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-7: de'i bdag po la sdigs pa'i phyir ldan pa g-yas byo zhing sdang mig drag tu bgrad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-9: sarba pa pa ka ra he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-10: byi sta na ma ham ka ru dra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-11: rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa yang khro bo'i ngang du gyur te bdag dang 'dra bar bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-12: de nas 'gying rngam pa las ral pa bsigs la lag pa g-yas pa bsgreng /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-13: sor mo gyen du bgrad la ba ya ke tsi ta dza la h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-14: ces brjod nas lag pa sta zur du gzhag cing lag pa g-yon pa rngam pa bzhin du skra gyen du bteg la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-15: pra dzny'a ke shi tsi ta dzva la h'um phat ces brjod la rngam pa'i nga ro bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-17: rkan sgra drag tu gtogs la rngam brjid chen po'i tshul dang ldan par bsam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-18: aom pra dzny'a su pa ya na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-20: aom badzra kro dha ae sha ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-21: de nas slar go cha'i phyag rgya snying gar bcings la btang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-22: aom badzra ka be tsa zhes brjod nas go bgo bar bsams te gnas lngar bsrung zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-23: aom na ma dhu ba bi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:273b-24: sbyi bor thal mo sbyar te sarba buddha mu tra sam ha ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-0: aa bhi shinytsi h'um phat ces brjod pas sku cir yang 'gyur @274a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-3: mgo mgrin 'khril cing bsgril la h'um zhes tshig 'bru drag bos ga las g-yon du lta ba'i tshul drag po re re bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-4: sumbha ni sumbha h'um zhes drag tu brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-5: rdo rje dril bu bsil te brkyang bskum bsgreng la 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su mchongs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-6: khams gsum nas 'byung sems can rnams; ;rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-7: 'od zer tshul du bsdus nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-8: de dag bdag gi lus la gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-9: sbro ba rdo rje thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-10: sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-12: brod pa can rnams dar ba ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-13: skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-15: rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-16: bo dhi tsitta'i gnas nyid du; ;khams gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-17: chos nyid skye 'gag med pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-18: dbyings su thim pas gnyis su med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-19: kun gyi ngo bo mnyam nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-20: thams cad snying po byang chub las; ;ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-21: bdag nyid med bas mnyam pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-22: thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-23: sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i blos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-24: bdag dang bdag gis so sor phye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-25: log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-26: 'khor ba rgyud lnga yi ba bri mas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-27: mya ngan mi 'da' yun ring ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274a-28: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-0: sku yi sbrul ba phyogs @274b bcur bkye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-1: gsung gis mtha' yas sems can sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-2: thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-3: sku gsum 'gro ba'i tshul ston pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-4: dus la bab pa'i sems can dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-5: las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-6: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-7: thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-8: yang dag nyid la yang dag grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-9: yang dag bsgral nas bde chen thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-10: mi ldog sa la nges par phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-11: phyin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-12: rgyal ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-13: rgyud drug gnas su mi skye phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-14: dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-15: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-16: 'khrug pa'i bag chags bag la nyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-17: bde 'gro lam la sgrib pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-18: ye shes 'bar pa'i mes bsregs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-19: mtshan nyid med par stong par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-20: sbyor ba'i lhums su phat kyis phat//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-21: gsang ba'i dbyings su h'um gis bsdu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-22: skur bskyed ye shes skur bsdus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-23: 'og min gnas mchog dam pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-24: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-25: stong gsum ma lus gdon pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-26: 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-27: skyes bu chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-28: bskal ba 'bar zhing snying rje'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-29: nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-30: sa bcu byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-32: de nas 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyogs su mchongs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:274b-33: ma tang gi gnas dang lung gi tshul du smos pa bzhin gsal bar bsgoms te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-1: 'khor 'byung bo mang po yang mngon du bkug par bsams te rkang pa gnyis bsnol ba'i drung du phyin nas byang shar mtshams su kha bltas te bdag nyid brkyang bskum gyi tshul du 'greng la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-2: mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-3: gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-4: sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-5: gzung 'dzin rkang lag bsnol ba'i sgo; ;yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis phye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-6: de nas h'um phat pra be sha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-7: rkang pas shag gis phye bar bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-8: de nas lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje gsum pa'i phyag rgya bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-9: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo snying gar bsgreng ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-10: aom shr'i he ru ka mah'a badzra sarba dushta na sa ma ya mu dra pra banytsa h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-12: las thar byed gang gis mnan nas kha lho phyogs su bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-13: brkyang bskum du bsgreng la aa aa zhes brjod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-14: lcags kyus snying gar sgo phye bar bsam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-15: g-yas nas rgyab tu bskor te lus kyi nang du zhugs ma thag tu rkang pa gshibs te dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-16: h'um zhes sgo phye bar bsam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-17: g-yas rgyab kyis bskor bas 'bod par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-18: ae hye hi mah'a ka ru sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-20: mah'a de ba ma ta ru dva dza zhes rdo rje gar gyi gom pa 'dor zhing lte ba'i phyogs su song la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275a-21: shin tu dmar po bzhi lte ba'i phyogs bzhir dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-0: yi ge h'um mchog tu brjod cing g-yas g-yon du lan gcig tu gar gyis @275b bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-1: de nas snying po 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-2: dho tse phya dho tse phya ma nu dha ram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-6: padma rakta dha ram badzra dha ram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-7: badzra mah'a mam ba dh'a ram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-9: de nas gar gyi tshul du snying ga phyogs su song la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-10: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas ci ltar bde ba gtor ma sbyin par mkhyen pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-12: ma btang gi lus su dbyer med par gzhal yas khang 'bar ba'i nang du khro bo he ru ka phyi'i phra men la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bkod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-13: sbyan drang ba'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi dbyings nas yi ge dza las lcags kyus gsal bar phyogs bcur 'phros te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-14: phyi'i rnal 'byor dgug cing sbyan drang ba'i phyag rgya gsal ba las 'khor dang bcas pa sbyan drang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-15: mi gsang ba'i gsad pa chen po chos nyid kyis bsgral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-16: sku gsung thugs che ba'i yon tan gyis bsgral ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-17: bdag nyid chen po lhun gyis grub pas bsgral lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-18: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo'i don bdud 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-20: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-22: 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-23: de tshe sems can thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:275b-24: shin tu khro zhing gdug par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-0: shin tu khro drag gtum pa @276a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-2: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-3: khro bas de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-4: sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-5: thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-7: dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-8: dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-9: h'um bzhis he ru ka bsgom /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-11: hes singha la sogs pa bsgom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-12: phat kyis sgo ba la sogs pa bsgom /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-13: h'um ha he phat kyis ting nge 'dzin bzlas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-16: ae hye hi bha ga wan; ;dza:h'um bam ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-19: ae hye hi tri sha to sa ma ya ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-20: ae hye hi aa ra li dhing dhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-21: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-22: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-24: gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-25: thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-26: gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-27: tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-28: tshogs kyi slob dpon gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-29: ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-30: sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-31: aom shr'i he ru ka mah'a badzra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-32: sarba dushtam sa ma ya mu dra pra be sha ya shr'i he ru ka h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276a-34: shr'i he ru ka mah'a badzrs sarba dushtam sa ma ya mu dra pra bha na tsa kra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-0: 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i @276b phyir; ;don kyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-2: aom shr'i he ru ka mah'a badzra sarba sa ma ya hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-3: sarba dushtam ka ya w'a ki tstta badzra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-4: sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-5: ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-6: mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub mchog gi rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-7: bdag cag stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-8: aom shr'i he ru ka mah'a badzra sarba dushtam sa ma ya mu tra aa ma ba stambha ka h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-9: aom gu hya tri sha sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-10: gu hya tri sha sa ma ya ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-11: aom badzra gu hya tri sha sa ma ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-12: dam tshig sa la bzhengs pa yi; ;dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-13: dam tshig tshul bzhin mi gshegs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-14: grub pa mchog dag ma stsal na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-16: dza:h'um bam ho:shr'i he ru ka mah'a badzra sarba dushtam sa ma ya mu dra pra bhan tsa kra bhaksha ya bhaksha ya bi to gas ya bi to gas ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-18: buddha kshe tram pra ti stambha ka h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-19: sku gsungs thugs su bdag sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-20: pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sbrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-21: nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-23: aom shr'i badzra ke ra mu ka sha ra y'a ya na ma:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-24: aom badzra ra ga sa ma y'a ya na ma:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-26: ga pra m'a y'a ya na ma:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-27: aom shr'i gandhe dza y'a ya na ma: aa ti bu ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:276b-29: tath'a bandhu nam ka ro ya mi ma h'a yo gi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-1: bral don dam thugs chud cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-2: byams dang snying rje dgra zun mi mnga' yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-3: gdug pa 'dul phyir dus la sa mi 'da' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-4: 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-5: nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-6: 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-7: ma sring byams pa'i tshul gyis 'grogs mdzad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-8: phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-9: dza:h'um bam ho: shr'i he ru ka ya h'a ai dan bu ya ti ba li dta kh'a gu dza ho /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-13: he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-14: dur khrod chen po gnas brgyad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-15: dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-16: dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:277a-18: dmar gyi aargham rgya mtshor bskyil //
