K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-4: de nas tshogs kyi gtor ma btang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-5: aom shr'i he ru ka mah'a badzra d'a ki n'i n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-14: badzra he ru ka sa ma ya yo gi shva ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-16: ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-17: dbyug pa'i brda yis mtshon nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-18: ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-19: dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-20: thal mo brda yis mtshon nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-21: ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-22: dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-23: glu yi brda yis mtshon nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-24: ma tshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-25: dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-26: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-28: sku ni dud kha chen bo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-29: zhal gsum po la phyag drug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-30: nag dang mthing ga dmar ba'i dbu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282a-31: g-yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-0: rdo rjes bkug cing zhal du @282b gsol; ;khyung gi khra chen 'bar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-1: g-yon pa gsum na thogs ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-2: sti ri'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-3: thod rlon dmar gyis bkang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-4: ster phra mo gsus ba nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-5: glo snying nang khrol 'byin cing za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-6: glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-7: zhing lpags g-yang gzhi sham thabs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-8: thod rlon phreng bas rgyan du byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-9: ma lus pa dag gsan du gsol; ;rgyu las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-10: ston ni ma nor don mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-11: mngag pa'i gnas su yud tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-12: thams cad kho nar dbang mdzad mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-13: srungs shig myur du rnam rgyal dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-14: thal ba bzhin du rab tu lhogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-15: rol cig dgongs shig de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-17: 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-18: 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-19: 'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-20: thams cad gsol te dgyes par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-23: shin tu mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-24: nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-25: mthing nag gcer bu ral pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-26: mi lpags rlon pa gos su gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-27: thal ba'i mtshan mas byugs ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-28: khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-29: phreng ba mang pos rgyan du byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:282b-30: lag na t'i sh'ul thod ba thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-1: rdo rje me phung 'khrug pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-2: re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-3: khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-4: theg chen rnal 'byor spyod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-5: gnod pa'i dgra bgegs gtan nas phyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-6: thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-7: rdul phran bzhin du brlag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-8: sems nyid theg pa chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-9: rnam thar la ni dgod par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-10: rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-11: dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-12: nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-13: ma lus pa dag bsnams su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-14: rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-17: rnam pa sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-20: rnam pa sna tshogs khro bo'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-0: ru lu ru lu h'um @283b bhyo h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-3: h'um ae sha h'um be sha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-5: na mashtsanda dha badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-6: ma h'a yaksha se na p'a ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-8: ae hye hi sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-9: a'a na ya badzra sh'antim badzra kro dha ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-19: badzra ae ka ra tsa ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-20: badzra ma no ha ra ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-29: badzra bidya tsa ra tsa ni ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-38: ae aa ra li ma nu sma ra ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-39: mi yi srin mo tshangs ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-40: khro bo dang ni 'jug sred mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-41: gzhon nu mo dang dbang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-42: rdo rje dmar mo bdud rtsi mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-43: zhi ba ma dang be con mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-44: srin mo dang ni za ba mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-45: rdo rje dga' ba mo dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-47: gcig pu spyod dang yid 'phrog mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-48: grub mo dang ni rlung mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-49: rdo rje yang ni gsod chen mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-50: me mo phag mo rgan byad mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-51: sna chen mo dang chu lha mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:283b-52: rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-2: rdo rje sngo nag bum rna mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-3: rdo rje dmar ser dril 'khrol ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-4: ma mo chen mo khyed rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-5: ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-7: ye shes thob par bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-8: sgrub pa rnams kyis las bya zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-9: rdo rje byin nas ming btags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-10: dam bcas bzhin du he ru ka //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-11: da ltar khyod kyis gzugs mchog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-12: mngon par ston la grub pa 'phrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-13: ji snyed grub mchog ma phul zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-14: khyed rnams mngon du ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-16: 'dug pa las rnams kun gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-17: aom padma pa da mu mu ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-22: bandha ya bandha ya; to sha ya to sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-23: badzra d'a ki n'i hri da yan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-25: gtor ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bsgyur la kha bhandha dang ras chen gyis bcad la rta mgrin dbang gi phyag rgya bcas la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-26: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-27: khro bo bskyed rdzogs las kyi bzlas ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284a-29: zhi ba'i mchog gtan phreng ba'i ' phrin las rab bsdus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-0: tshad med snying rje @284b skyed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-1: byang chub sems dpa' dag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-2: sngon du 'gro ba'i lam mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-3: sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-4: khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-5: ye shes gtso mo mchog nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-6: gsum pa las ni 'das pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-7: rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-8: de ni gzugs dang byin rlabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-9: bzlas brjod dang ni 'phrin las dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-10: dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-11: phun sum tshogs pa bdun po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-12: btab na ci 'dod sbyin no zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-13: dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-14: 'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-15: rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-16: gzugs ni thugs kyi phyag rgya dbyings la ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-17: lcags dang lcags la seng ldeng la sogs pa tsher ma can gyi shing las sor brgyad dam bcu gnyis bar byas pa mgo 'jug ma nor bar shing rtsa ba phyogs su mgo byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-18: sor brgyad la sor gcig la rgya mdud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-19: rked par sor gcig la rgya mdud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-21: smad zur gsum du byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-22: ri rab ltar brjid pa 'dug pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-25: thog ma nyid du sku gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-26: de'i 'og tu rgya mdud gzhal med khang du dmigs te phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:284b-27: h'um sgril ma lnga bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-5: 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran pa tsam gyis bskul te phyi nang gi mchod ba ci 'byor pa phul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-6: dam tshig rjes su bkug nas gnyis su med pa'i rgyan rdzogs par mdzad pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-7: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin gyis brlab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-8: de nas sras phur bu'i khro bo bskyed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-9: aom badzra kro dha k'i li k'i la ya ma na phat ces brjod pa'i lte ba yan chad mthing nag la dbu skra kham pa zur gsum pa'i thabs su bsgreng la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-11: thod rlon gyis bcings shing bshams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-12: spyan gsum sdang mig tu bgrad de phyag g-yon pa'i phur bu la gzigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-15: dur khrod kyi me phung gi nang du lte ba man chad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-16: ae'i nang du sum cha tsam nub pa la phyag bzhi la g-yas kyi gong ma sta re kha yar bstan te brdeg par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-17: g-yon pa ri rab kyis gnon pa'i stobs su 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-18: g-yon dang pos rdo rje kha tv'am ga 'khrol zhing bdud kyi khams 'jigs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285a-19: 'og ma phur bu zur gsum 'debs pa'i stabs su gzas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-0: stobs dang mthu la sogs @285b pa khro bo thams cad 'dus pas kyang che ba gcig phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-1: rtag pa chen po bzhugs par bstan pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-2: sprul pa'i skur byin gyis brlab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-3: de la rigs lngar byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-4: 'bru lngas gnas lnga byin gyis brlab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-5: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-9: de'i 'og tu thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-11: ngos gsum du h'um gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-12: da nas sku bltas pa dang rigs so so'i khro bo thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-13: khro bo dkyil 'khor de dag nyid phyogs bcur 'phros pa slar 'dus nas h'um h'um phat phat kyi sgra 'byin cing de'i sku la bstims te dbang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-14: byin rlabs thams cad brlan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-15: de nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-16: sngon gyi thugs dam du zhal gyis bzhes pa lags pas des gros mdzad cing bskul ba la bzhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:285b-17: bdag nyid kyang bdag nyid chen po yin pas phur pa yang bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir lag pa g-yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur ba'i steng du h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-0: g-yon pa'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyur pa'i steng du @286a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-7: 'di rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du gzhag ste su ra ta stvam zhes brjod pas thal mo mnyam par sbyar la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-8: aom badzra aa dza li h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-9: zhes brjod pas sor mo cung zad bsnol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-10: aom badzra bandha h'um zhes brjod pas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la bsdam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-11: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas phur pa blangs te chang ba'i nang du bcug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-12: lag pa chang pa phye la mthe bo dang; srin lag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-13: mthe'u chung dang gnyis kyi bar du yang gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-14: mthe bos cung zad bsgul zhing drud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-15: aom badzra aa be sha ya aa aa zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa thams cad zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sku yungs 'bru tsam bar mtshams med par phur pa la bsdu zhing bstim mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-16: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-17: sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i bar du phur ba bcug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286a-18: aom badzra sa tva ra dza h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-0: de nas sor mo bug bug byas te lag pas phur pa bzung @286b la; aom h'um hr'i: phur bu ba phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-1: ces brjod pas de nas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la the bong gnyis gshibs pa'i chang bar bcug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-3: ha na ha na ti ba ta tsakra h'um phat; ces brjod nas dril te bdag nyid chen po thams cad gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'i gzi byin thams cad phur pa'i sku la bstims pas stong gsum gang bar me stag 'phro zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-4: dmigs pa thams cad sgrub pa'i byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-5: dbang dang ldan par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-6: mdun gyi nam mkha' la ae'i gdan la bzhugs par gsol nas zungs kar gyi rgyal pos drang cing gu gul sbyar bas bdug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-7: phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-8: de nas yid la brang pa'i 'phrin las bcol te de'i byin brlabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-10: bdag nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs la snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um mthing nag pa zhig bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-11: aom badzra kro dha k'i li k'i la ya m'a ra ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-12: ces brjod pas phur bu'i khro bo ci 'dra ba zhig de las byung ste phyogs bcu thams cad du sems can gyi don byas nas phur bu la bstim mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-15: sa ya bye ba snyed bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:286b-16: bsnyen pa gtong bar 'dod na phur bu nyid snying ga la bsdu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287a-2: thog ma nyid du brtag pa'i sa rnyed nas bskrad pa dang mtshams gcad pa la sogs pa byas nas skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bo'i sdang mig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287a-4: rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pas bskrad nas phur pa bcu khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te phyogs bcur btab nas ci tsam 'dod pa thams cad mtshams gcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287a-5: rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287a-6: de nas las kyi lha mnyes par byas nas de nas ting nge 'dzin gong nas byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287a-7: bsnyen pa tshang nas gnas chen por dkyil 'khor gru gsum la rtse mo lho phyogs su bstan te zhing chen gyi thal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287a-11: srub ma'i lo ma'i lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287a-16: bong bu'i bdud rtsi las sbrus te zhing chen gyi thal ba ma rnyed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287a-17: til nag po las gzhi blangs te gzugs byas kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287a-18: ri mo bris la mdog smug nag tu bgyis te shul ba la sogs ba la zhing chen gyi raktas h'um che ge mo m'a ra ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287b-0: ces bris te snying gar glan te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gan rkyal du bzhag ste mgo bo lho phyogs su bstan te gdon @287b de nyid dgug pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287b-4: gsang ba'i thugs ga'am snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po zhig bzhag la dza: h'um bam ho: badzra aam gu sha che ge mo zhig h'um zhes brjod nas khro bo lcags kyu can grangs med pa brgyud ma sha stag byung bas bgegs kyi snying ga nas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287b-6: dza:h'um bam ho: che ge mo m'a ra ya pra pe sha phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287b-8: gzugs sam ri mo la phab la lcags kyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287b-10: lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bcings pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287b-12: de'i sems ma 'khrugs par byas nas ae'i nang du rtse mo 'og tu song bar bsam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287b-13: de nas phur pa blangs te las kyi lha'i snying po dang bcas pas drag tu cung zad bskul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:287b-14: thal mo sbyar phur bu thabs kyis gsor la rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas nas ting nge 'dzin gsal bar ma khugs kyi bar du dril na; ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa dang gdan gyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam ma reg par gzas la khro bo'i ske'am ma rked ba nas lag pa g-yon pas bzung ste rdo rje tho ba'i sta re lag pas rdeg cing rdo rje sder mo'i sngags lan gsum dang nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab cing bzlas te seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa gcig snying gar btab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-2: dpung mgo gnyis dang brla'i nang rol gnyis su yang gdab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-3: lte ba khung du yang gdab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-5: na ma: sa manta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra nan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-6: aom gha gha gha ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-7: sarba dushtan ma ra ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-8: k'i li k'i l'a ya sarba p'a pam phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-9: h'um h'um badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya badzra dha rod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-10: a'a dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya wa ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat drag tu brjod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-11: phur pa de btab zin nas de'i steng du las kyi lha phyag rgya dang sngags kyis mnan te lag pa gnyis sor mo bsnol ba mthe bo dang mthe chung rtse sbyar brkyang nas gzhan ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-12: drag por rgyab tu bskyed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-14: aom badzra karma kro dha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-15: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te g-yas phyogs su bskor te k'i la ya'i mgo la lan gsum bdug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-16: de nas phur pa slar mi 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-17: sus kyang mi phyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-18: lhag par yang zad cing thal phyin par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-19: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol la bcangs nas gung mo gnyis rgyab sbyar rtse mo rnon por bsgreng la phur pa'i klad du gnon /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288a-20: phur pa'i lha dang bgegs che ge mo khyod dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhig par bsgo zhing sngags 'di lan bdun bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a @288b sa ma ya h'um phat ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-2: sems ma dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-3: bsgo ba thams cad nyan par bsam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-4: sor mo gnyis nang du bsnol te mthe bo dang mthe'u chung ngo sbyar la bsgreng /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-5: khu tshur mi bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bkyed de phur ba'i steng du mnan cing sngags 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-6: aom badzra kro dha ha na ha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-8: pa tsa pa tsa; bandha bandha; tstshinda tstshinda /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-11: stobs po che'i sngags bar phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-12: gong du bka' nyan pas bdag gi dbang du gyur nas ci bsgo ba thams cad bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-13: yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brdeg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-14: gur gum sbyar mas bdug la gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-15: de nas lag pa gnyis sbyar la mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-16: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-17: mdzub mo gnyis kha gram la g-yas g-yon du bsgreng /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-19: lhag ma rnams nang du bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te rkang pa g-yon pas bgegs kyi snying gar mnan te lan bdun bzla /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-20: aom badzra kro dha yak kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-21: h'um h'um phat phat ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:288b-22: de nas rdo rje be con gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-0: lag pa gnyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud du sbrel la @289a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-1: mthe bong g-yon pa'i steng du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-2: mdzub mo gnyis ngo sbyar te bsgrengs nas sdang mig tu bsgrad la rdeg cing sngags 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-3: aom badzra kro dha mah'a ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-5: da ha ba tsa bi dhvam sa ya dza ti lambo dha ra autstshusma kro dha h'um phat ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-6: de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal po rdeg cing las 'di shin tu brtan zhing grub par bcol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-7: rdo rje brjid gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis mnan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-8: khro bo rnams kyi spyi bo nas 'dus pa'i steng du h'um mthing nag la rdo rje lcags kyu'i rgya gram me lce'i phreng bas bskor ba'i rgya gram gyi dkyil 'khor yi ge gsum gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba zhig tu gnas pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-9: aom badzra badzra merta h'um sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pa las gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad bye ba gru bzhi pa zhig tu gyur la de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang khu dbu gsum phyag drug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-10: phyag g-yas dang po rdo rje 'bar ba 'phyar te bsnams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289a-11: g-yon dang po rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar bstan; 'khor dpag tu med pas pho brang gtams pa khro bo rnams kyis shin tu gzir zhing mi g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-0: las ma grub na bskal pa mthar thug kyang gnas par @289b bsam; ;'phrin las kyang de bzhin du bcol te gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-1: yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-2: gtor ma nag po cha gcig bshams te dam tshig can gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-3: 'jig rten thams cad la bsngo zhing dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-4: drag po'i gtor ma cha gcig gnod byed de nyid bkug ste zar gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-5: 'phrin las 'di'i dus su phra men ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-7: srin mo rnams kyang spyan drang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-10: ae hye hi bha ga w'an /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-12: dhyo ru lu ru lu h'um zhes lan gsum brjod de spyan drang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-13: pra titstsha ho zhes brjod la gtong /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-14: aom sa ma ya aargham pra titstsha h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-15: zhes lan gsum brjod la aa mri ta phul la las bcol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-18: tshes bcu bdun nam mar gyi ngo la nyin mtshan gyi grang du gza' dang sbyar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-20: rtags byung ba la sogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-24: shing rkang gcig pa dang gnod par nges pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-27: bdag nyid byang chub sems la gzhol zhing mang du thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-28: lha nye bar gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-29: mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-30: drag cing ltes pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:289b-32: gzhan la re ba med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-5: zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-6: mnan bzlog drug tu bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-7: zhi ba'i zhi ba chen po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-9: thab kyi khung zlum po chag gang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-10: thab kyi dkyil du 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi mtho gang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-12: 'jim pa'am bong ba la 'bur du brkos te gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-13: thab kyi kha khyer rdo rjer bas bskor; de'i phyi rim zlum po la padma 'dab brgyad bri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-14: bkra shis kyi lha mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-16: bsreg pa'i rdzas shu gu shug shags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-31: gtor ma dkar po 'bras las bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-32: yo byad thams cad dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-35: lha'i sku mdog kyang dkar po grangs dang sbyar nas mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-36: rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290a-38: snga ma'i steng du gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyis bsnan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-1: yo byad thams cad kyang ser po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-3: phrugs su bcas pa grangs bzhin du dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-4: dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la; dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla gam phyed par bcad pa'i tshul du bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-5: las kyi lha padma gar gyi dbang phyug dgod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-8: chos gos dmar po lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-9: drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi dbus su gru gsum /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-12: mtha' thod pa gsar rnying gis bskor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-13: dpal chen mo dang khro bcu dgod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-14: yo byad thams cad nag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-18: las kyi khro bo bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-19: phra men ma chas gos nag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-20: sbyin sreg lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-21: aom sh'antim gantim ti ka ra pra sha ma ni r'a tsa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-22: aa ba ba sva ba ba; aa mu ka si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-23: svasti shi bam ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-25: ba sham ku ru pra sha ma na ye ho pushtim ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-27: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:290b-28: khro bo mnan bzlog gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po thugs gsang ba'i dkyil @291a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-2: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la thig bzhi gdab pas re'u cha dgu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-3: dbus su zla ba phyed par bcas pa'i tshul du bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-4: de'i phyi rim phra men ma bcu drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-6: kham phor ri mor bris pa dgu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-8: tshil chen dang ni tsitta'i tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-9: ras chen 'phan gdugs la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-10: dkyil 'khor rgyun du bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-13: thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dgod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-14: rakta dri chen gyi mandal bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-15: yo byad thams cad tshang bar bsags la 'phags pa mchod cing bdag kyang bza'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-16: dam ma 'dres shing mi gcig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-17: spyod lam yan chad ci'i sgo nas kyang sgrub pa'i zhal zas dang tshogs rnams phyi rol du byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-18: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa de nyid ting nge 'dzin gnyid dbang du mi btang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-19: spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs dngos grub kyi dbyig bsgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-20: srid pa gsum gyi sems can rgyu'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir tshul mkhas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291a-21: spyod pa gzob pas rnal 'byor sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-0: de la dang por sgrub pa @291b la bgegs mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mtshams gcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-6: rdzas 'di dag gis rab tu gcad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-7: bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang yang rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-8: rdzogs nas dngos grub blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-9: lha'i grangs bzhin bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-11: aom ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo h'um zhes drang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-12: de nas bsnyen sgrub lags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-13: yo byad rnams phyi rol du mid byung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-15: lha dang bdag mchod la sogs pa'i rjes la lhag ma dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og tu rin po ches kha bcad la sba bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-17: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phra men ma'i sgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-21: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su goo ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-22: de'i phyi rim padma 'dab ma brgyad la shar du stag gi mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-23: lho ru g-yag gi mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-25: byang du gzig gi mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-26: shar lhor pha bang gi mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-27: lho nub tu pu shud kyi mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-28: nub byang du srin bya'i mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:291b-29: byang shar du skya ga'i mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:292a-0: @292a *// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsoo ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:292a-1: de'i phyi rim padma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du smigs bu'i mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:292a-2: lhor bya rgod kyi mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:292a-3: nub tu sha ba'i mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:292a-4: byang du khu byug gi mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:292a-5: mtshams bzhir pha wang gi mgo can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:292a-7: byan lag gi mgo can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:292a-8: pho rog gi mgo can rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:292a-10: dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pra mo ha /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:296b-10: de nas rdo rje chos kyi bka' dam pa 'di ma chags pa'i dbang gis bka' bzhin byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:296b-11: de nas 'khor de dag thal mo sbyar nas rjes su yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:296b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-005:296b-13: bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las /
